channel.title: RuneScape Forums Clone
channel.description:
I'm going to start working on a runescape forums clone using PHP and MySQL. If you have any ideas for features post them here :)
[b]Progress[/b]: |||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| 100% done
What's done: -Register/Login -Boards/Categories -User Groups -Posting threads/replies -Admin panel --Edit users --Create/edit groups --Create/edit boards/categories --edit settings
and more! :)
Download: ~REMOVED~ Demo: ~REMOVED~
since it's just 'a bunch of shit i figure why not just remove it.
people to thank: -inertia ~ cock sucking douchebag -cumescape ~ apparently it's not good enough to have taken less than a week to code considering i worked on it less than an hour a day, and didn't even touch it on the weekend
last time i make anything for you unappreciative cock sucking, cum guzzling, deep-throating faggots..

item.title: RuneScape Forums Clone
item.dc:creator: @Ben Ben
item.description:
@Ben wrote:

Writing a forum system is not hard at all.

It might be a long process but anyone capable of handling forms, and reading/writing from a database is
also capable of creating a forum system (better or worse.)

As for securing SQL queries as stated before, mysql_real_escape_string is good enough.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Forums Clone
item.dc:creator: @Elch Elch_
item.description:
@Elch wrote:

[quote=“Server-Unknown.Net, post:46, topic:291629”]Lol… People just stuck up that’s why I don’t bother with anyone from this community, its just there inner nerd. Thats all tbh, really who cares about the time… Time IS quality.

People complained about the Runescape website, but throughout TIME it has become better, and those people became more satified. Its all about color though, you have to have taste like someone else to get a good rating here… All BS if you ask me though. Lots of things that shouldn’t go on go on in these forums ya know. Just get use to it.[/quote]
Its best to be quite when you don’t know what your talking about.

Color is an important player in web design, yes, but its not all about colors. The logo, links, and content have a much bigger roll. No one wants to look at boring content nor links.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Forums Clone
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

cumescape:

I did 90% of the work on my current project (FOForum) in 1 week

He completed his project. They might not be a complete replica, but it’s done for him. You’re on the same page since you did 90% in a week, and he finished his in just over a week. How can you bitch about the time it took?

  1. You just said that 90% shit.
  2. Not everyone has a shiton of time to dedicate to computer stuff.
  3. It doesn’t matter how long it takes, as long as it’s done and done well.
cumescape:

I haven’t posted on moparscape in over a year! other then 2 posts

k. He didn’t say anything about you posting over at moparscape, he said you’re about as smart as one.
You didn’t get that, so it’s safe to say Unhandled was correct.

On this note, I’ll leave booher’s thread alone and if you’re still sore, PM me for all I care.

Read full topic
